text: Kumiko Sakamoto (born 13 December 1972) is a Japanese volleyball player. She was a member of the Japan women's national volleyball team. She competed at the 1990 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship, and at the 1990 Asian Games, winning a bronze medal. She played for Orange Attackers, and Denso Airybees. == References == == Other websites == * 3 photos of Kumiko Sakamoto - Getty Images Category:1972 births Category:Japanese volleyball players Category:Living people
title: Kumiko Sakamoto
